main event: Object observed twice on consecutive days between 19 and 25 April 1964.
interesting points: The object was reported as white in color and egg-shaped., Motion was described as 'rise up and down'., The observation was made by ranchers not mentioned by name., The exact size of the object was not reported., The location of the sighting was twenty-four miles east of Miles City, Montana, making it inaccessible except by air or horseback.
